Package stage

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • stage.Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Creation of a Horse Race simulation placed on a Hippodrome. This class has a Broker, a set of Spectators and a set of pairs Horse/Jockey (HorseJockeys).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static Broker broker
      The sets' Broker instance.
      private static HorseJockey[] horseJockeys
      The sets' array of pairs Horse/Jockey instance.
      private static int numberOfHorses
      Number of horses competing with each other.
      private static int numberOfRaces
      Number of races happening at the same event.
      private static int numberOfSpectators
      Number of spectators appearing on the hippodrome.
      private static Spectator[] spectators
      The sets' array of spectators' instance.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main function which contemplates the execution of the simulation. This method will then run the entire scenario of a horse race at an hippodrome, this being a coordination between several threads of the game's entities and shared regions.
        Parameters:
        args - input arguments to the simulation execution.

      • generateMoney

        private static int generateMoney​()
        Generate money between a value of 1 and 999.
        Returns:
        a money value between 1 and 999.

      • generateAbility

        private static int generateAbility​()
        Generate a value for representation of pair Horse/Jockey's ability.
        Returns:
        a value between 0 and 5 which must be considered as the step of the horse on track, while running.
